newsitem.title: UK: GOLF-NORMAN PREPARES FOR OPEN AT LOCH LOMOND.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-NORMAN PREPARES FOR OPEN AT LOCH LOMOND.

text.p: World number one Greg Norman of Australia will prepare for this year's British Open at Royal Troon in July by playing in the 800,000 pounds ($1.3 million) World Invitational at the Loch Lomond Golf Club in Scotland the week before.

Norman joined an impressive entry list which already includes last year's British Open champion and world number two Tom Lehman of the United States, European number one Colin Montgomerie and fellow Briton Nick Faldo -- Norman's nemesis in last year's U.S. Masters.
Fellow Australian Robert Allenby has also agreed to play, the organisers said on Monday.
The event, won last year by Thomas Bjorn of Denmark, takes place from July 9 to 12.
